questions.text: Describe your favorite book and explain why you would recommend it to others.
What are the advantages and disadvantages of using social media for students?
Tell us about your family and your relationship with them.
If you could travel anywhere in the world, where would you go and why?
Discuss the importance of learning English in today's globalized world.
Describe a challenging situation you faced and how you overcame it.
What are your career aspirations and how do you plan to achieve them?
Compare traditional classroom learning with online learning. Which do you prefer and why?
If you could meet any historical figure, who would it be and what would you ask them?
Describe the qualities of a good leader and provide an example of someone who demonstrates these qualities.
